verses.verse: וְאֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <S%H428><s%> now these מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> Now these [are] the kings הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom הִכּ֤וּ <S%H5221><s%> smote בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> which the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּֽרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> and possessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצָ֔ם <S%H776><s%> their land בְּעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan מִזְרְחָ֣ה <S%H4217><s%> toward the rising הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun מִנַּ֤חַל <S%H5158><s%> from the river אַרְנוֹן֙ <S%H769><s%> Arnon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> unto mount חֶרְמ֔וֹן <S%H2768><s%> Hermon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעֲרָבָ֖ה <S%H6160><s%> and all the plain מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <S%H4217><s%> on the east

סִיחוֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> who dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <S%H2809><s%> in Heshbon מֹשֵׁ֡ל <S%H4910><s%> [and] ruled מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <S%H6177><s%> from Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> which [is] upon the bank נַ֨חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <S%H769><s%> Arnon וְת֤וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> and from the middle הַנַּ֙חַל֙ <S%H5158><s%> of the river וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> and from half הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וְעַד֙ <S%H5704><s%> far יַבֹּ֣ק <S%H2999><s%> Jabbok הַנַּ֔חַל <S%H5158><s%> even unto the river גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> [which is] the border בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וְהָעֲרָבָה֩ <S%H6160><s%> And from the plain עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far יָ֨ם <S%H3220><s%> to the sea כִּנְר֜וֹת <S%H3672><s%> of Chinneroth מִזְרָ֗חָה <S%H4217><s%> on the east וְ֠עַד <S%H5704><s%> far יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> and unto the sea הָעֲרָבָ֤ה <S%H6160><s%> of the plain יָם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea הַמֶּ֙לַח֙ <S%H4417><s%> [even] the salt מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> on the east דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way בֵּ֣ית הַיְשִׁמ֑וֹת <S%H1020><s%> to Bethjeshimoth וּמִ֨תֵּימָ֔ן <S%H8486><s%> and from the south תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> the foot אַשְׁדּ֥וֹת <S%H794><s%> of the slopes הַפִּסְגָּֽה׃ <S%H6449><s%> of Pisgah

וּגְב֗וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the coast ע֚וֹג <S%H5747><s%> of Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan מִיֶּ֖תֶר <S%H3499><s%> [which was] of the remnant הָרְפָאִ֑ים <S%H7497><s%> of the giants הַיּוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בְּעַשְׁתָּר֖וֹת <S%H6252><s%> at Ashtaroth וּבְאֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <S%H154><s%> and at Edrei

וּ֠מֹשֵׁל <S%H4910><s%> And reigned בְּהַ֨ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount חֶרְמ֤וֹן <S%H2768><s%> Hermon וּבְסַלְכָה֙ <S%H5548><s%> and in Salcah וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> and in all Bashan עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> unto the border הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <S%H1651><s%> of the Geshurites וְהַמַּעֲכָתִ֑י <S%H4602><s%> and the Maachathites וַחֲצִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> and half הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> the border סִיח֥וֹן <S%H5511><s%> of Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king חֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <S%H2809><s%> of Heshbon

מֹשֶׁ֧ה <S%H4872><s%> Them did Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> God וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִכּ֑וּם <S%H5221><s%> smite וַֽ֠יִּתְּנָהּ <S%H5414><s%> gave מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3069><s%> God יְרֻשָּׁ֗ה <S%H3425><s%> it [for] a possession לָרֻֽאוּבֵנִי֙ <S%H7206><s%> unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֔י <S%H1425><s%> and the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> and the half שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh ס

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> And these [are] the kings הָאָ֡רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the country אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom הִכָּ֨ה <S%H5221><s%> smote יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> which Joshua וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּעֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on this side הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> on the west מִבַּ֤עַל גָּד֙ <S%H1171><s%> from Baalgad בְּבִקְעַ֣ת <S%H1237><s%> in the valley הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הָהָ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> even unto the mount הֶחָלָ֖ק <S%H2510><s%> Halak הָעֹלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> that goeth up שֵׂעִ֑ירָה <S%H8165><s%> to Seir וַיִּתְּנָ֨הּ <S%H5414><s%> gave יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> which Joshua לְשִׁבְטֵ֧י <S%H7626><s%> unto the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יְרֻשָּׁ֖ה <S%H3425><s%> [for] a possession כְּמַחְלְקֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4256><s%> according to their divisions

בָּהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> In the mountains וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֗ה <S%H8219><s%> and in the valleys וּבָֽעֲרָבָה֙ <S%H6160><s%> and in the plains וּבָ֣אֲשֵׁד֔וֹת <S%H794><s%> and in the springs וּבַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> and in the wilderness וּבַנֶּ֑גֶב <S%H5045><s%> and in the south country הַֽחִתִּי֙ <S%H2850><s%> the Hittites הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> the Amorites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> and the Canaanites הַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> the Perizzites הַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites פ

מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king יְרִיח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הָעַ֛י <S%H5857><s%> of Ai אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which מִצַּ֥ד <S%H6654><s%> which [is] beside בֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> Bethel אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king חֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> of Hebron אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king יַרְמוּת֙ <S%H3412><s%> of Jarmuth אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לָכִ֖ישׁ <S%H3923><s%> of Lachish אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king עֶגְלוֹן֙ <S%H5700><s%> of Eglon אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king גֶּ֖זֶר <S%H1507><s%> of Gezer אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king דְּבִר֙ <S%H1688><s%> of Debir אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king גֶּ֖דֶר <S%H1445><s%> of Geder אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king חָרְמָה֙ <S%H2767><s%> of Hormah אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king עֲרָ֖ד <S%H6166><s%> of Arad אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king לִבְנָה֙ <S%H3841><s%> of Libnah אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king עֲדֻלָּ֖ם <S%H5725><s%> of Adullam אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king מַקֵּדָה֙ <S%H4719><s%> of Makkedah אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> of Bethel אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king תַּפּ֙וּחַ֙ <S%H8599><s%> of Tappuah אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king חֵ֖פֶר <S%H2660><s%> of Hepher אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king אֲפֵק֙ <S%H663><s%> of Aphek אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לַשָּׁר֖וֹן <S%H8289><s%> of Lasharon אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king מָדוֹן֙ <S%H4068><s%> of Madon אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king חָצ֖וֹר <S%H2674><s%> of Hazor אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king שִׁמְר֤וֹן מְראוֹן֙ <S%H8112><s%> of Shimronmeron אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַכְשָׁ֖ף <S%H407><s%> of Achshaph אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king תַּעְנַךְ֙ <S%H8590><s%> of Taanach אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king מְגִדּ֖וֹ <S%H4023><s%> of Megiddo אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king קֶ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6943><s%> of Kedesh אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יָקְנֳעָ֥ם <S%H3362><s%> of Jokneam לַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <S%H3760><s%> of Carmel אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one

מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king דּ֛וֹר <S%H1756><s%> of Dor לְנָפַ֥ת <S%H5299><s%> in the coast דּ֖וֹר <S%H1756><s%> of Dor אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> one מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations לְגִלְגָּ֖ל <S%H1537><s%> of Gilgal אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one

מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king תִּרְצָ֖ה <S%H8656><s%> of Tirzah אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> one כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> all the kings שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty וְאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> and one פ
